A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This was a great film. 

The worst part is the abject rejection of it by some hardcore Star Wars fans. 

It doesn't fall directly in line with expectations and challenges the themes of older movies. So that upsets the fragile ego of some of the super fans. 

There were some mild pacing issues. And a little too many jokes in poignant moments. But overall it should be remembered as one the great Star Wars films. 

Don't let the sour superfans turn you away from this exciting and entertaining Episode in the Star Wars Saga.
